title: Full Show (Pat Beverly comments on joining Lakers, Kevin Durant rips NBA 2K rating, Tom Brady's degree of difficulty)
description:
00:00 Is this Tom Brady's highest degree of difficulty ever heading into a season?
24:16 Pat Beverly says he is "super excited" to play with Russell Westbrook
56:25 Kevin Durant rips his NBA 2K23 rating
1:09:45 Tom Brady tells his O-Line to embrace the negativity
1:23:09 Will Dalton Schultz end up being the X-Factor for the Cowboys this season?
1:33:32 Are the Lakers over-hyping the addition of Pat Beverly?
1:40:56 How different will Baker Mayfield look this season?
1:48:03 Are the reigning Super Bowl Champions being overlooked this season?
1:54:16 Do you see Odell Beckham Jr. signing with the Bills?
